name: Math Heroes
summary:
Math Heroes is a challenging game where you can use the power of Math to fight monsters. All you need to do is to solve math questions to make a hit. Questions can be simple at the beginning and incredibly difficult at the end.
You will face different types of enemies and each of them will try to defeat your Hero. There is only one way to win – you should answer quicker than enemy strikes you. And don’t even try to cheat, because every wrong answer lets the monster to make an advanced hit.
Each correct answer gives you coins that can help you to unlock upgrades. You can make the combo hit if you are successful in several mathematical questions in a row.
